full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Request for Supply Arrangement (RSA) for Third Party Logistics Services

## Tender Details

* Title: RFSA - Third Party Logistics
* Solicitation Number: WS4005094157
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: 2023-07-05
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-25T14:00:00 (Expired)

## Background

The Government of Canada invites eligible suppliers to submit a Request for Supply Arrangement (RSA) for Third Party Logistics services to supply Health Products Logistics Services (HPLS) to the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC).

## Scope of Work

The RSA shall cover the provision of HPLS, including:

* Importation and receipt of medical countermeasures and other health products
* Sampling, inventory management, recalls, and storage
* Reporting, distribution, and disposal services related to medical countermeasures
* Warehousing and life cycle management of products

## Procurement Information

* Purchase Category: Service (SRV)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Region of Opportunity: Canada
* Region of Delivery: Canada

## Contracting Entity

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* Contracting Officer: Mary Paradis (SPAC/PSPC) - mary.paradis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL and Contact Information

* [Notice URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16767283)
* Contact Information: Mary Paradis (SPAC/PSPC) - mary.paradis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
